articles.description: Mr Trump claimed references to his efforts to overturn the 2020 US election result as ‘the Big Lie’ was tantamount to comparing him to Adolf Hitler.
articles.content:

articles.title: Donald Trump's defamation lawsuit against CNN thrown out by federal judge
articles.description: The US news network described the former US president's claim that the 2020 presidential election was stolen from him as a "big lie" - a phrase associated with Nazi propaganda.
articles.content:
A federal judge has rejected a $475m (£369m) defamation lawsuit brought by Donald Trump against CNN.
The US news network described the former US president's claim that the 2020 presidential election was stolen from him as a "big lie".

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump's $475 mln 'big lie' defamation lawsuit against CNN dismissed
articles.description: In a ruling late on Friday night, U.S. Judge Raag Singhal, who was nominated by Trump in 2019, said CNN's words were opinion, not fact, and therefore could not be the subject of a defamation claim. "CNN's statements while repugnant, were not, as a matter of law, defamatory," wrote Singhal, who sits in federal court in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, near Trump's home at his Mar-a-Lago resort.
articles.content: A federal judge has thrown out Donald Trump's $475 million defamation lawsuit against CNN, in which the former president claimed the network's description of his election fraud as the "big lie" associated him with Adolf Hitler. In a ruling late on Fr... [1726 chars]
